result.title: Design and performance of advanced primary treatment with microscreen
result.description: Guidelines for design and operation of advanced primary treatment with microscreen. Technical specifications including pretreatment, mesh size, hydraulic velocity, chemicals (substances, doses, contact times), operational requirements (backwash, cleaning), and operational performances (removal rates, backwash sludge quantity and quality.

result.title: Operation and optimization of membrane ammonia stripping
result.description: Scientific report on the operation and optimization phase of the operation including long term process performance and operation experience (maintenance strategy) as well as a condensed primer for future adopters of this technology including operational recommendations (process start-up and shut-down).

result.title: Regulatory, Market, Socio-economic and Ethical Context Analysis in the Pilot Sites and anticipated (short- and mid-term) evolutions
result.description: The deliverable will analyse the prevailing legislation and regulatory frameworks in the pilot sites with respect to DR and identify constraints and restrictions for the smooth introduction of innovative DR technologies and business models in energy markets. The deliverable is an outcome of the task 2.2.

result.title: Online learning material accesible
result.description: All material produced (the format of the dialogues, the material for training industrial players and industrial champions to implementing the roadmaps, as well as our SMART Maps and guidelines for their use) will be organised into a structured format online. This approach will ensure open access to all material, as well the opportunity for industrial players to use our material for training and implement our approach well beyond the duration of the project.

result.title: Options for nitrogen removal after advanced carbon extraction
result.description: POWERSTEP guidelines of process options to remove nitrogen with municipal wastewater after advanced carbon extraction. Nitrogen removal options will be compared, also with conventional processes for resources (energy, footprint, chemicals) and performances (removal, stability, flexibility, sludge production).

result.title: Scale-up event n1
result.description: The events represent the core of the project in terms of impact for the start-up hubs and their members. Each two-day long event will be composed of 4 main parts relying upon and contributing to extend the impacts of the different work-packages of the project : coaching the start-up for the fundraising pitch, the fundraising pitch event, a matchmaking event/business meeting to enhance market access and an open innovation workshop to facilitate the creation of collaboration projects. The first event will be organized by Opticsvalley.

result.title: E-book production gathering issues, results and outcomes of the 3 CFT Dialogues
result.description: Using audio and video shoot during the CTF events, we will design an e-book to report the most relevant aspects emerged during the Diaogues as well as the conclusions of the 3 events. The tool will be also used as a mean of dissemination. The e-book will be licensed under Creative Commons and will be shared on the project website and on social media channels.
